trans-unit.source: Creates a bitmap compatible with the device and fills it the specified color

seg-source.mrk: Creates a bitmap compatible with the device and fills it the specified color

target.mrk: Creates a bitmap compatible with the device and fills it the specified color

trans-unit.source: Handle to the compatible solid bitmap (DDB).

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the compatible solid bitmap (DDB).

target.mrk: Handle to the compatible solid bitmap (DDB).

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: The color format of the bitmap created by the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleBitmapEx() function matches the color format of the device identified by the $hDC parameter.

seg-source.mrk: The color format of the bitmap created by the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleBitmapEx() function matches the color format of the device identified by the $hDC parameter.

target.mrk: The color format of the bitmap created by the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleBitmapEx() function matches the color format of the device identified by the $hDC parameter.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap can be selected into any memory device context that is compatible with the original device.

seg-source.mrk: This bitmap can be selected into any memory device context that is compatible with the original device.

target.mrk: This bitmap can be selected into any memory device context that is compatible with the original device.

trans-unit.source: When you no longer need the bitmap, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.

seg-source.mrk: When you no longer need the bitmap, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.

target.mrk: When you no longer need the bitmap, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.
